MR No. 1531 - Christ's Method of Imparting Truth

  (Portions of this manuscript appear in Evangelism, and in Manuscript Release No. 373.) 


     The great Teacher held in His hand the entire map of truth, but He did not disclose it all to His disciples. He opened to them those subjects only which were essential to their advancement in the path to heaven. There were many things in regard to which His wisdom kept Him silent.
